text:
Craig Ferguson (born 17 May 1962) is an Scottish actor, comedian and late night television host. He hosted "The Late Late Show with Craig Ferguson" from 2005-2014 on CBS. He also hosted Shark Week in 2010 on the Discovery Channel. He became an American citizen on February 1, 2008.
He currently hosts "Celebrity Name Game" on Syndication. He also hosts "Join or Die with Craig Ferguson" on History.

annotations.surface_form: The Late Late Show with Craig Ferguson
Join or Die with Craig Ferguson
